contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=January 2013}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Zwalm |picture=Vinkemolen Sint-Denijs-Boekel 10-04-2009 17-17-48.JPG |picture-legend=Vinkemolen Wind Mill in Franskouter, Sint-Denijs-Boekel (2009) |map=ZwalmLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Zwalm in East Flanders |arms=Zwalmwapen.jpg |flag=Flag of Zwalm.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-OV}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Oudenaarde|Oudenaarde]] |nis=45065 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor= [[Bruno Tuybens]] |majority=Samba |postal-codes=9630, 9636 |telephone-area=055, 09 |web=[http://www.zwalm.be/ www.zwalm.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=53 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=44 }} '''Zwalm''' is a [[municipality]] located in [[Flemish Region|Flanders]] and in the [[Flanders|Flemish]] province of [[East Flanders]], in [[Belgium]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Beerlegem]], [[Dikkele]], [[Hermelgem]], [[Hundelgem]], [[Meilegem]], [[Munkzwalm]], [[Nederzwalm]], [[Paulatem]], [[Roborst]], [[Rozebeke]], [[Sint-Blasius-Boekel]], [[Sint-Denijs-Boekel]] and [[Sint-Maria-Latem]]. On January 1, 2006 Zwalm had a total population of 7,765. The total area is 33.82 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 230 inhabitants per km². <gallery> Image:Church, Roborst, Zwalm, Flanders, Belgium.JPG|Church of Roborst </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.zwalm.be Official website] {{nl icon}} {{East_Flanders}} [[Category:Zwalm]] [[Category:Municipalities of East Flanders]] {{EastFlanders-geo-stub}}
